Package net.java.jddac.common.type

Provides the basic data structures used in various APIs within JDDAC.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ArgArray.ArgConverter An interface to allow conversion of complex types to and from an ArgArray.
ArgArray.UnitsConverter The UnitsConverter interface provides a mechanism to attach advanced unit conversion capabilities to certain get methods.
 

Class Summary
ArgArray The ArgArray class is the fundamental building block in JDDAC for passing information between objects.
Float64 The Float64 class represents a 64 bit floating point number.
Float64J2me A J2ME representation of a 64 bit floating point number.
Float64J2se J2SE versions of floating point number representations.
JddacId A class to represent a JddacId fields.
Location Represents a geographic location.
LocationJ2me J2ME version of repreentation of geographic location.
LocationJ2se J2SE version of a geographic point in space.
LocationJ2SeWithOffset Specify a location that includes an x/y/z offset and rotation.
TimeRepresentation Represents an instant in time per 1451.1.
TypeAttr Contains string enumerations for the different supported data types.
Uncertainty Represents the uncertainty of a numeric value.
Units Represent a Unit.
 

Package net.java.jddac.common.type Description

Provides the basic data structures used in various APIs within JDDAC.

Package Specification
